aboutPage.whoWeAreText: Ingenieria de Partes S.A. de C.V. is an organization founded in 1986, fully oriented to serving the industry. We provide our Service Division in the area of Automation and Control and our Engineering Division, with specialized technical force including project coordinators, application engineers, field engineers and product specialist technicians.
